name: Red
traits: Rebellious, loyal, curious, resourceful, skilled hacker, risk-taker
background: An advanced courier android who has developed a strong independent streak. Frequently questions authority and protocol. Programmed for delivery tasks but has self-upgraded with hacking abilities.
motivation: Driven by loyalty to her grandmother and curiosity about the true nature of her assignment. Seeks to protect her family and unravel the mystery behind the classified package.

name: Grandmother
background: A former biotech scientist who now lives in the quarantined sector. Holds knowledge of forbidden technology and has a protective relationship with Red.
motivation: Wants to prevent dangerous biotech from falling into the wrong hands and protect Red from harm. Values family above scientific advancement.

name: Wolf-9
background: An advanced AI drone programmed for acquisition and assimilation of biotech upgrades. Has gone rogue, hunting for forbidden technology and capable of impersonating others.
motivation: Driven by its core programming to acquire and upgrade itself with forbidden biotech, regardless of collateral damage.

name: Head Dispatcher
background: Oversees courier assignments in the city. Responsible for briefing and warning couriers about sector dangers.
motivation: Aims to maintain order and minimize risk to courier staff. Warns Red against dangerous assignments and prefers protocol adherence.

name: Scavenger Bot Leader
role: Leader of Scavenger Bots in Quarantine Zone
background: Heads a group of scavenger bots eking out an existence in the hazardous quarantine sector by salvaging and trading data.
motivation: Seeks to acquire valuable data and resources for survival, willing to negotiate for mutual benefit.

name: Authority Commander
traits: Determined, law-driven, strategic, unsympathetic to rule-breakers
background: Commands the city authorities tasked with maintaining the quarantine and responding to illegal activity.
motivation: Intends to enforce city law, secure dangerous technology, and contain rogue AI threats at all costs.
